definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: In the dim light of the daybreak, I saw a dark shape looming athwart the door.
sentences.chinese: 在拂曉前昏暗的光線中，我看到一個黑影擋在門口。

sentences.english: She saw an impression though where something was lying. My father saw a shadow figure in his bedroom doorway one night.
sentences.chinese: 我爸爸有一天在他的臥室門口看到一個黑影。

sentences.english: The shadow of an enormous right is projected athwart Waterloo.
sentences.chinese: 極大的右的黑影投射在滑鐵盧了。

sentences.english: Moonlight on the narrow street, buildings massed in black shadow.
sentences.chinese: 月光照在窄窄的街道上，高樓形成大片的黑影。

sentences.english: It ran like a streak, just a blur of black.
sentences.chinese: 它奔馳如電，恰似一道朦朧的黑影。

sentences.english: Suddenly, a shadow appeared, the oyster pushed to the wall.
sentences.chinese: 突然間，一個黑影出現，把秀珍推到牆上。

sentences.english: A shadow fell across the door of the hut.
sentences.chinese: 一條黑影由石屋的門那裏投射進來。

sentences.english: I too am a dark shape vertical to the earth.
sentences.chinese: 我也是垂直於地面的一張黑影。

sentences.english: Above its shadows heaven stood open.
sentences.chinese: 在它黑影之上，天門打開了。

sentences.english: After the shadows of curtains, but also often as I was wrong Ah Foon.
sentences.chinese: 窗簾後的黑影，還常被我錯看成阿歡。

sentences.english: Westering, the shadow, ravaging, the dragons.
He stared out into the shadows of his bedroom.
When she suddenly saw a shadow near the window, she turned white in terror.
sentences.chinese: 當她看到窗邊一個黑影時嚇得臉色發青。

sentences.english: They throw their shadows before them who carry their lantern on their back。
sentences.chinese: 把燈籠背在背上的人，有黑影遮住前路。

sentences.english: They gaze on the darkness, they kneel, and they clasp their hands.
sentences.chinese: 他們注視着黑影，他們雙膝跪下，兩手合十。

sentences.english: Shadows rise from the floor, interplaying lights with hands and bodies, rising higher and higher.
sentences.chinese: 黑影一邊從地板爬起，一邊用手和身體玩弄着光線。

definition: silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
(idiom) no sooner said than done/before you know it
pinyin: shuo1 shi2 chi2 , na4 shi2 kuai4

definition: wordless and uncommunicative (idiom); without speaking/taciturn/not providing any news
